result.name: southern-north-sea-plankton-survey-rv-sir-lancelot-11-60
result.notes:
Analysis results of a historic plankton survey in the southern North Sea. Data 
consists of numbers of plankton identified from Hensen net samples, along with 
associated positional data.

organization.name: marine-environmental-data-information-network
organization.title: Marine Environmental Data & Information Network
organization.description: MEDIN is a partnership of UK organisations committed to improving access to marine data. Our partners are both public and private sector.

result.title: Southern North Sea Plankton Survey - RV Sir Lancelot 11/60

resources.description: The Cefas Data Portal contains metadata records and data sets available to download and connect to in support of our commitment to open science. Data is available in the following formats: CSV, ESRI Shapefile. The data can also be accessed via the WFS and WMS protocols.
resources.name: Cefas Data Portal
